org.jetel.component.jms

Class JmsMsg2DataRecordBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.component.AbstractDataTransform
      • org.jetel.component.jms.JmsMsg2DataRecordBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JmsMsg2DataRecord, Transform
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JmsMsg2DataRecordProperties

    public abstract class JmsMsg2DataRecordBase
extends AbstractDataTransform
implements JmsMsg2DataRecord
    Simple partial implementation of JmsMsg2DataRecord interface. Supposed to be extended by full implementations.
    Since:
    11/28/06
